GATE Developer/Embedded Version 7.1 release (November 2012)

GATE Developer/Embedded 7.1 introduces

  • new plugins such as TermRaider (for term extraction) and Coref_Tools (for improved coreference resolution),
  • support for new document formats including MediaWiki and PubMed
  • updates for plugins that wrap third-party tools (OpenNLP, Parser_Stanford, ...)
  • architectural changes to improve stability and scalability of GATE Embedded in long-running applications.

... and many other improvements and bug fixes. Full details can be found in the changelog in the user guide.

The GATE Developer/Embedded package is available for download from http://gate.ac.uk/download/.
